name: The Nest - Horror Survival Game
description:
The Nest horror game. This game is based on a Philippine mythical creature. You can now experience puzzles, anxiety, survival and etc. I'm improving some of the mechanics of the game and adding more features. I'm  now releasing the beta version of the game and it is available on mobile. Please support my game, especially if you are a Filipino. I hope you like it. Stay tuned for more updates. You can ask me on my Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/ReckDev/

How To Play:

Using joysticks and buttons, you can interact with objects and automatic pickups. Get a key for each locked door, a mythical book, and an entity statue for ritual. Explore other things, avoid monsters in order to survive, or else you die. Pick up some health supplements or pills to increase your health. Use garlic or salt to kill enemies. Find who did this.
